original_title: Cheers to the season, best of TV shows, and a Smart TV from Dialog Television
original_body_lines: Tis the season of giving, and Dialog Television is unwrapping a special gift for its cherished customers by introducing its exclusive Seasonal Channel Pack – a delightful blend of premium entertainment giving access to viewers to the full Dialog Television channel bouquet along with the chance to win a 65-inch SMART TV.

Share moments of joy with your loved ones, when you activate the full Dialog Television channel bouquet for just Rs. 499/- (taxes included) for 30 days. Upon activating the seasonal channel pack, you will also receive the opportunity to enter a draw to stand a chance to win a spectacular 65-inch SMART TV. This offer is valid till 31st December 2023 and the channel pack can be simply activated using the MyDialog App or by sending an SMS to 0770 679 679, type «ON [your Dialog Television Connection No.] 5555».

Heralding in this season of magic and festivities, Dialog Television offers customers a diverse range of channels that cater to every taste of you and your family. From heart-warming holiday classics to belly laugh inducing comedies and award-winning blockbuster hits to the latest Bollywood hits,  Dialog Television’s curated seasonal content with over 120 channels will undoubtedly bring joy to your home.

With this offer there’s an extra special treat for sports enthusiasts who will have front-row seats to the latest sporting events such as Abu Dhabi T10 League with Dialog Television. Whether it›s the crack of a cricket bat or the roar of a football crowd, Dialog Television ensures you won›t miss a single moment of excitement and cheer.
